name: unnerve
effect: Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle. Affected Pokémon can still use bug bite or pluck to eat a target's Berry.
short_effect: Prevents opposing Pokémon from eating held Berries.

flavor_text.sword_shield: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
